keyMoments.title: Learns About Ivankov's Devil Fruit
keyMoments.description: Bentham learns that Ivankov has the Horm-Horm Fruit ability to control hormones and change people's bodies.
keyMoments.significance: Understanding Ivankov's powers helps explain how Luffy can be saved from Magellan's poison.
keyMoments.quote: I ate the Horm-Horm Fruit so I can alter a person's hormones, changing their skin, temperature and sex.

keyMoments.title: Discovers New Kama Land's Origin
keyMoments.description: Bentham learns that New Kama Land exists between Level 5 and Level 6 and was built by a prisoner with tunneling abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Explains how this hidden sanctuary has existed unknown to prison authorities.

keyMoments.title: Learns About Level 6 Prisoners
keyMoments.description: Bon Clay discovers that Crocodile, Ace, and Jinbe are all imprisoned in Level 6 - Eternal Hell.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the location of key characters and the existence of the most dangerous level of Impel Down.

keyMoments.title: Begins Unwavering Vigil for Luffy
keyMoments.description: Despite being told Luffy's survival is unlikely and that he won't be able to save Ace even if he survives, Bon Clay refuses to give up hope and begins cheering for his friend.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the incredible depth of Bon Clay's friendship and loyalty to Luffy, showcasing one of the series' core themes.
keyMoments.quote: I believe in miracles! Luffy, you can do it!

keyMoments.title: Ten-Hour Vigil Outside Treatment Room
keyMoments.description: Bon Clay stands outside the treatment room for ten straight hours, continuously cheering for Luffy despite his own exhaustion, refusing to leave his friend's side.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most powerful displays of friendship in One Piece, showing Bon Clay's selfless devotion.

keyMoments.title: Inspires New Kama Land to Cheer
keyMoments.description: Bon Clay's dedication moves all the New Kama Land residents and Ivankov to join him in cheering for Luffy's recovery.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how one person's conviction and loyalty can inspire an entire community.

abilities.description: A unique fighting style combining ballet and martial arts.

relationships.description: Bon Clay has an incredibly deep friendship with Luffy, willing to sacrifice everything for him.

evolutionMoments.description: Demonstrates unwavering loyalty by cheering for Luffy for ten hours straight during his life-threatening treatment.

relationships.description: Fellow Okama and ally in New Kama Land who treats Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Endures Agonizing Healing Treatment
keyMoments.description: Luffy screams in extreme pain for hours as Ivankov's healing hormones battle Magellan's poison inside his body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's incredible willpower and determination to survive no matter the cost.

keyMoments.title: Miraculous Recovery
keyMoments.description: Luffy recovers from Magellan's deadly poison in less than a day instead of the expected three days, defying all medical expectations.
keyMoments.significance: Major turning point that allows the Impel Down breakout to continue and gives Luffy a chance to save Ace.

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Explains Horm-Horm Fruit Abilities
keyMoments.description: Ivankov provides a detailed explanation of his Horu Horu no Mi Devil Fruit powers, which allow him to control and inject hormones to change people's bodies.
keyMoments.significance: First comprehensive explanation of his hormone-controlling abilities and their medical applications.
keyMoments.quote: I ate the Horm-Horm Fruit so I can alter a person's hormones, changing their skin, temperature and sex.

keyMoments.title: Reveals New Kama Land's Creation
keyMoments.description: Ivankov explains that New Kama Land was built by a prisoner with tunneling abilities between Level 5 and Level 6.
keyMoments.significance: Provides background on the hidden sanctuary's origins.

keyMoments.title: Recounts Shiryu's Background
keyMoments.description: Ivankov reveals in a flashback that Shiryu was the Head Jailer who was imprisoned for his excessive bloodlust and killing of prisoners.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Shiryu as a major threat and explains his backstory.

abilities.description: Can inject hormones to change skin color, body temperature, sex, and heal injuries.
Can inject hormones that boost the body's natural healing, though it requires extreme willpower to survive.

reveals.information: Detailed explanation of Horm-Horm Fruit powers and their applications

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Talks with Jinbe About Luffy
keyMoments.description: While imprisoned in Level 6 awaiting execution, Ace discusses his younger brother Luffy with Jinbe, expressing concern about Luffy's reckless nature.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ace's brotherly concern even while facing his own death.

keyMoments.title: Converses with Ace in Level 6
keyMoments.description: Jinbe talks with Ace about Luffy while they are both imprisoned in Level 6 of Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the developing relationship between Ace and Jinbe as fellow prisoners.

reveals.information: First episode voiced by new voice actor Katsuhisa Hōki after the death of Daisuke Gōri

keyMoments.title: Shiryu's Background Revealed in Flashback
keyMoments.description: Shiryu appears in a flashback where Ivankov explains that he was once the Head Jailer of Impel Down but was imprisoned in Level 6 for his bloodlust and indiscriminate killing of prisoners.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Shiryu and establishment of his violent nature and conflict with Magellan.

occupations: Former Head Jailer of Impel Down

reveals.information: Was imprisoned in Level 6 for killing too many prisoners due to his bloodlust
Former Head Jailer of Impel Down under Magellan
